title: Lobster Thermidor
ingredients: ['1 medium cooked lobster', '30g butter', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '325ml fresh fish stock', '60ml white wine', '60ml double cream', '1/2 teaspoon English mustard', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan']
